data.actual_result: The link instantly opens while you're swiping.
data.expected_result: Link only opens if I press and release the link. The left or right menus open normally.
data.short_description: Swiping to open lists while touching on a link instantly opens that link. Maybe iOS 10 only.
data.steps_to_repro: - Scroll to a message with a link. - Swipe left or right to try to open the members or channels list, with the starting touch on the link. - Don't let go.
